documents.title: Deep Learning Models for PV Power Forecasting: Review
documents.abstract: This paper reviews deep learning methods for PV forecasting including MLP, CNN, RNN, and GNN models.

documents.title: Using Machine Learning Algorithms to Forecast Solar Energy Power Output
documents.abstract: Compares ML algorithms (RF, XGBoost, etc.) for forecasting solar PV output using historical data.

documents.title: A Multi-Step-Ahead PV Power Forecasting Approach Using 1D-CNN and Transformer
documents.abstract: Combines CNN for feature extraction and Transformer for long-term sequence forecasting in PV prediction.

documents.title: Data-driven prediction of battery cycle life before capacity degradation
documents.abstract: Predicts lithium-ion battery life from early cycle data using ML models, with 9.1% RMSE.
